name: From Ivan
summary:
TO: HUMAN RESOURCES MANAGER (HRM) 
FROM: BRANCH OPERATIONS SUPERIOR SUPERVISOR (BOSS) 
 
Hello IVAN 
 
As our new Human Resources Manager, your job is to manage our human resources, which means picking out the best greeting card to send people on the many occasions when sending a greeting card is appropriate. Studies show that distributing appropriate cards has a significant impact on the mood, productivity, and long-term outcomes. Do not take this responsibility lightly. 
 
From Ivan is a short branching narrative game where you control the story indirectly by sending mail to your friends, family, and coworkers. It was created by Sean Bouchard, Martzi Campos, and Will Campos. Music by Kyle Laporte.
